name: Bus stop dance party
description:
Controls: 1, 2, 3, 4, arrow keys, and four mystery letter keys on the keyboard to activate your killer dance moves. B) Rock on!  The game may take a few seconds to load. Be patient! 

This is just a short little game where you get to dance while you're waiting for the bus! It was the fourth in a series of 5 'games' created for my semester one, year one studies at RMIT university.  Unfortunately, this game can only be played in the browser and with a computer. Please don't download it and modify the files, or post as your own. Thank you and I hope you enjoy!

This game is 'finished' but in the future I may add some bug fixes to it.
